titleStmt.title: To the constable of [blank] You are required in Their Majesties names forthwith to assemble the freeholders of your town ...
titleStmt.author: Webb, Joseph.
Dedham (Mass.). Constable.

notesStmt.note: "Dated in [Boston] this [eighth] day of [June] anno Domini. 169[4]."
Signed in ms.: Joseph Webb cler.
A form directive to constables to call prospective jurors completed in ms. with names of jurors called.
Line 1 of form at 2899:25b completed in ms.: Dedham.
Reproduction of original in the Massachusetts Historical Society Library.
